title: Can't access email but need to change password
body: I keep getting logged out of my account because someone has my password. I can't change it though because I don't have access to my email anymore.

replies.body:
That sounds extremely frustrating! If you hit us up in a [**support ticket**](http://riot.com/2iGnX0K), we'll be able to assist you with sorting your account out so you'll have easier access to your account going forward.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I don't know which email I used to sign up. I made it like 4-5 years ago and I'm pretty sure I deleted it. What should I do because the guy is playing ranked on my account and purposely losing.
Just do your best at filling out the fields in the ticket form and one of our recovery specialists will get back in touch to work with you on this.

I'm trying to fill out a support ticket but it's giving me this error even though I'm filling in the fields it's mentioning. 

Link to picture of error: http://imgur.com/gallery/82QxF

Weird, I've never seen that error before. Can you try submitting your ticket using a different browser or [**clear your browser's cache**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) before trying to submit again?

Let me know if this helped. :)
I've tried submitting tickets on Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and Firefox. I keep getting the same error on every browser...

Can you make sure **all fields** have something in them? Even if you don't recall the correct info for a field, just leave an "N/A" or "I don't recall" in the fields you cannot recall answers for.

If you still run into this issue after making sure all fields have at least something in them, let me know.
That worked, thanks. It went through so now we play the waiting game...
